plot outline: Mastar Sridhar Pant is a man of principles the village where he teaches doesn't value qualities.A Tamasha troupe led by a female dancer Chandrakala enters the village. Chandrakala steals the heart of everyone frustrated with this Mastar demolishes her temporary shelter.In order to seek revenge she stays in the village where in adult school students also start to attend the Tamasha.Mastar decides to comfort Chandrakala again but during her performance she gets injured and as humanity he goes to aid her eventually following in love with her.Mastar tells Chandrakala to keep their relationship a secret but Bajirao whose against Mastar sees him frequently visiting Chandrakala and tries to expose him.
title: Pinjra
plot: A respected village schoolteacher falls for a travelling dancer and faces a moral dilemma.

Mastar Sridhar Pant is a man of principles the village where he teaches doesn't value qualities.A Tamasha troupe led by a female dancer Chandrakala enters the village. Chandrakala steals the heart of everyone frustrated with this Mastar demolishes her temporary shelter.In order to seek revenge she stays in the village where in adult school students also start to attend the Tamasha.Mastar decides to comfort Chandrakala again but during her performance she gets injured and as humanity he goes to aid her eventually following in love with her.Mastar tells Chandrakala to keep their relationship a secret but Bajirao whose against Mastar sees him frequently visiting Chandrakala and tries to expose him.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
